channel.title: Retirements on Stats On the T
channel.description: Recent content in Retirements on Stats On the T

item.title: 2015 US Open Still The Most Brutal in Tennis History
item.description: After two rounds in extreme heat conditions, the 2018 US Open has seen 12 men’s singles matches end in retirement. Is this a historic high for the number of early retirements at a slam? And how do high retirement counts impact the progress of the draw?
